title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picurl = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
readcount = #{readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where articleID = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
